  • 1.I.1F

    #Analysis II
    2003

    Let EEE be a subset of Rn\mathbb{R}^{n}Rn. Prove that the following conditions on EEE are equivalent:

    (i) EEE is closed and bounded.

    (ii) EEE has the Bolzano-Weierstrass property (i.e., every sequence in EEE has a subsequence convergent to a point of EEE ).

    (iii) Every continuous real-valued function on EEE is bounded.

    [The Bolzano-Weierstrass property for bounded closed intervals in R1\mathbb{R}^{1}R1 may be assumed.]
